dct_description_sm: One map in two parts. Map shows Hudson County- the companies/property owners of the land are labeled along the shoreline. Grants by the State and Commissioners include American Dock & Improv. Co., Morris Canal Grant, Jersey Shore T. Co., and H. Land Co.. Map shows different ferry areas, Jersey Flats, Bedlore's Island, and Ellis Island. Railroads include CRR of NJ, NJRR, Erie Railway, and Northern RR of NJ.
